requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: intel x86 family, 2Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: opengl 2.0 supported graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any OpenGL supported GPU/iGPU
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 2.0+ support

  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core

  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent

  • Sound Card: any
